resources.string: Place google maps contagion spread map here
Do you have a cough without a known cause? YES/NO
If YES: When did the cough start? How long have you had it? (within the last week? Month? 6 months? Year? Longer than a year?) -- YES/NO
Do you have shortness of breath without a known cause? -- YES/NO
Do you have malaise (a vague feeling of bodily discomfort)? -- YES/NO
Do you have fever (temperature > 100.40 F or 380 C) or fever symptoms (chills, etc)? -- YES/NO
Has anyone close to you experienced any of the above symptoms within the last 14 days? -- YES/NO
Have you or someone close to you traveled internationally or on a cruise within the last 14 days? -- YES/NO
Have you or someone close to you traveled internationally or on a cruise within the last 14 days? -- YES/NO
